title: Feels bad :(

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Apparently Skin boosts don't give you Unavaliable skins anymore. 
_(I must've missed the memo)_
I remember seeing someone get Marauder Warwick before it was released, So I thought it was worth a try...

Wasted RP skin boosting my main champ xD

Feels bad

_(Hurry up Lunar Revel.... D:)_

{{champion:268}}

replies.body: Yeah but you totally unlocked _undefined_ for the game! Gnarly! ; )

hahah I have the skin now though :P thats what counts xD
se excited to play it!
So how many plushies have you ordered?

hahaha you've got me! xD
Ive got 2 Azir Statues and 1 Zodiac shirt (It as Azir and Sol on it :3) in my cart.

Just gotta get the $$$ before clicking buy xD

It might just be because it's an event specific skin, though. Or maybe it's because the relevant files haven't hit live? If you can remember, was the Marauder Warwick while it was still on the PBE or in the patch it was released but before it was actually available for purchase?

Yea could be because it's event special, thats true.

Maruder Warwick was released in the patch, but just not available in shops.
Azir is HOT I want him to have his way with me

but gravelord is da best anyway

and you wouldn't even be able to play chess( recall animation)
